posts.post_content:
I am looking for an example of HOFer Ed Walsh.  Ungraded or very low grade.  Any condition is fine as long as you can tell its him and its original.  Holes, tears, writting, mice nibbles, water damage, bicyle noise maker, infant chew toy, etc are fine.  I'm not looking to get a beauty but just a low end example for not much dough.

PM me or send scans with asking price to [url]beyondbeliefdrew@yahoo.com[/url]

Drew

Hey There Drew!

Did ya See this one?

[url]http://tinyurl.com/T206Walsh[/url]

[quote name="irishdenny" post=970406]Hey There Drew!

Did ya See this one?

[url]http://tinyurl.com/T206Walsh[/url][/QUOTE]

Well that would cover the mouse chewing but to answer your question yes only I was hoping to pay in the neiborhood of maybe $25 for this type of card.
Drew

Yeah... I Understand :) 
Just thought I'd Help... I almost pull the trigger on it myself, than thought the same!
